name: Dr. Fantastic's Tarot Readings
desc: A simple app for giving a user an on-the-fly Tarot card reading, using a Tarot Card API for the images, flavor text, and randomized card selections.

name: le Phare Weather Dashboard
desc: An app that allows users to see weather forecasts for a given city, when searched.  This uses the OpenWeather API to query the database and provide all forecast data.
